com.linecorp.armeria.server.http.dynamic

Annotation Type Converter


  • @Repeatable(value=Converters.class)
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value={TYPE,METHOD})
public @interface Converter
    Annotation for specifying ResponseConverter onto a class or a method.

    This annotation has following restrictions:

    • When marked on a class, it can be repeated and must specify the target class, except Object.class.
    • When marked on a method, it can't be repeated and should not specify the target class.

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      java.lang.Class<? extends ResponseConverter> value
      The type of the ResponseConverter that will convert the object whose type is target().

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      java.lang.Class<?> target
      Target type to be converted.

    • Element Detail

      • value

        public abstract java.lang.Class<? extends ResponseConverter> value
        The type of the ResponseConverter that will convert the object whose type is target().

      • target

        public abstract java.lang.Class<?> target
        Target type to be converted.
        Default:
        java.lang.Object.class
